description: Days in year in Gregorian calendar.
comments: This sequence is periodic with period 400. The exceptions to the apparent period 4 are a(100) = a(200) = a(300) = 365. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Jul 10 2009
links: Index entries for sequences related to calendars
mathematica: (* first do *) Needs["Calendar`"] (* then *) Table[ DaysBetween[{y, 1, 1}, {y + 1, 1, 1}], {y, 48}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 18 2010 *)
author: Juan-Carlos Lerman (jclerm(AT)aztec.asu.edu)
